Name: Heghine
description:
Heghine, 40, is a farmer and lecturer at the Syunik Regional State College. She lives together with her husband and daughter in Kapan, Armenia.

Heghine has been farming for many years. She and her husband own cows and oxen. From the milk they get she makes dairy products that go to neighbors and relatives.

Heghine wants to build up her farm and be able to produce more. She has applied for a 1,000,000 AMD loan through Kiva's field partner SEF to buy three sows plus forage to feed the livestock. She offers her thanks in advance for your understanding and help.
